3CF.F.summary: Canaf Investments Inc., together with its subsidiaries, processes anthracite coal into de-volatized (calcined) anthracite in South Africa. The company offers calcined anthracite to steel and ferromanganese manufacturers as a substitute product for coke. It also acquires, redevelops, and rents real estate properties primarily targeting the student and affordable housing market. Canaf Investments Inc. operates in Canada, South Africa, and the United Kingdom. The company was formerly known as Canaf Group Inc. and changed its name to Canaf Investments Inc. in July 2018. Canaf Investments Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
